abstract: A private equity firm has proposed acquiring Talbots, in a deal that would value the struggling women’s retail chain at about $212 million, nearly double its market value at Tuesday’s close of trading.
snippet: A private equity firm has proposed acquiring Talbots, in a deal that would value the struggling women’s retail chain at about $212 million, nearly double its market value at Tuesday’s close of trading.

headline.main: Sycamore Makes Takeover Bid for Talbots
